column1: Smoque BBQ////It's worth noting that they were busy on a Saturday afternoon
column2: as expected.  The line was almost out the door
column3: but we waited maybe 20-30 minutes max from the line to receiving our food.  They have a good system here - wait in line
column5: and when your food is ready
column6: THEY tell you where to sit.  This prevents people from "saving" tables and camping out while they wait for their food.
